tool_description: Generates detailed trade orders based on current and target portfolio allocations.

order_type.description: Default order type: market, limit, stop_limit

error_messages: Position array mismatch: current_positions, target_positions, and asset_symbols must have same length.
Invalid order type: Must be one of [market, limit, stop_limit].
Invalid positions: All position values must be non-negative.
usage: Provide current_positions, target_positions, and asset_symbols. Choose order_type for trade execution preference.

net_cash_flow.description: Net cash flow from all trades
